data.name: Hyper Catch
data.detailed_description:
Hyper Catch is a fast paced multiplayer third person catch game. You only win if you catch your opponent(s). You will receive weapons and other tools to improve your chance of winning. This is not a typical shooter game! Hyper Catch is set in the future where nobody gets killed anymore. Nano robots rebuild your body no matter what happens to it. People have come up with a new type of hunting game, you win when you touch the other player, but it's not that easy because the maps in Hyper Catch are completely destructible and change over time.

More information coming soon!

People have come up with a new type of hunting game, you win when you touch the other player, but it's not that easy because the maps in Hyper Catch are completely destructible and change over time.

data.short_description: Hyper Catch is a fast paced multiplayer catch game. You only win when you touch your opponent. You will receive weapons and other tools to improve your chances to win. This is not a typical shooter game! The worlds are completely destructible and the players are regenerated by nano-bots.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 3.0
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Mild Nudity and General Mature Content.
